properties.displayName: _CSGP: Azure Monitor- Removing of a Resource Lock-Medium
properties.description:
Description: This query identifies when someone removes a resource lock from an azure resource which can be an indicator of compromise 
 Handling Guidance: 1. Reach out to the user, which is under "Actor/Caller" and investigate why they are performing these actions. 2. If necessary involve their manager in the conversation.
properties.query:
//Author: Samer Takieldin
//Source: N/A
//Reviewer: Samer Takieldin
//Description: This query identifies when someone removes a resource lock which can be an idicator of compromise 
//Handling guidance: Reach out to the user, which is under "Actor/Caller" and investigate why they are performing these actions. If necessary involve their manager in the conversation
//
AzureActivity
| where OperationNameValue == "MICROSOFT.AUTHORIZATION/LOCKS/DELETE"
| where ActivityStatusValue == "Success"
| extend Activity = case(OperationNameValue == "MICROSOFT.AUTHORIZATION/LOCKS/DELETE", strcat("Resource Lock Removed"),
    "unknown")
| extend ResourceGroup = tostring(parse_json(Properties).resourceGroup)
| extend AzureResource = tostring(parse_json(Properties).resourceProviderValue)
| extend x = tostring(parse_json(Properties).resource)
| parse x with ResourceName "/" *
| parse x with * "microsoft.authorization/" LockName
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    CallerIpAddress,
    Activity,
    ResourceName,
    Caller,
    ['Azure Resource']=AzureResource,
    ['Azure Subscription Id']=SubscriptionId,
    ['Azure Resource Group']=ResourceGroup,
    LockName
